name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1: Songs of Rebellion: Lorde on Curating the Soundtrack
detailed_description: Hear from the singer/songwriter herself on what it was like to handpick each artist and song featured on the soundtrack of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
about_the_game: Hear from the singer/songwriter herself on what it was like to handpick each artist and song featured on the soundtrack of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
